nodes.text: Erub II was a location where, by 3 ABY, the Trandoshan bounty hunter Bossk had found the smugglers Han Solo and Chewbacca trawling the sewage seas in search of spare parts. Bossk nearly succeeded in capturing the pair in order to claim the bounty on their heads, but ultimately failed.
Erub II was mentioned in "Tooth and Claw", a short story written by Michael Kogge and published in the From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back anthology in 2020.
